committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To direct the Director of the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services to carry out a pilot program to establish community outpost houses, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community Outpost Outreach and Engagement Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Community Outpost Outreach and Engagement Act

This bill authorizes the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services to make grants for establishing and operating community outpost houses to provide long-term stabilization in the relationship of law enforcement and the community.

titles.title: Community Outpost Outreach and Engagement Act
